prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes bass, drums, but without vocals.
captions:
Style 1:
No vocals, but with bass and drums, this song is complete.

Style 2:
This song is composed of bass and drums, but without any vocals.

Style 3:
Vocals are absent, yet the bass and drums remain in this song.
